channel.title: scala on DSkrzypiec Blog
channel.description: Recent content in scala on DSkrzypiec Blog

item.title: Implementing SQLite parser in Scala
item.description: Intro About a year ago I’ve played a bit with parsing T-SQL. At the time I’ve used Microsoft library and ANTLR for generating lexer and parser based on predefined T-SQL grammar. Recently I’ve come back to this topic. I’ve implemented SQLite parser almost from scratch (without code generation). …, but why? In general I wanted to have a SQL parser in order to build some kind of static analyzer tool for SQL and databases.

item.title: First thoughts on Scala
item.description: Intro This post is about my first thoughts on Scala programming language. There is a great chance that I’ll be using Scala in the upcoming months, so I’ve read Programming in Scala in the last couple of days. Besides reading a book I also watched a bunch presentations and tutorials on YouTube and write few simple programs as an exercise. Scala is the most similar to F# from all programming languages I know.
